title: Understanding Brian's Challenges
text: Consider what Brian's mother, Nancy, observes about his ability to perform tasks. What does she say about his understanding of these tasks?

title: Analyzing Brian's Task Completion
text: Brian can complete tasks like making purchases, but what does Nancy say about his understanding of these tasks?

hintAnswer: limitations to his understanding of how the world works
title: Identifying the Core Issue
text: What is the main reason Nancy believes Brian would struggle to live independently?
choices: limitations to his understanding of how the world works
